text: "Weak in the Presence of Beauty" is a 1986 song by Floy Joy and is the title track to their second studio album Weak in the Presence of Beauty. It went to number 85 in the United Kingdom, number 68 in Canada and number 29 in Australia. ==Alison Moyet version== In 1987, Alison Moyet covered "Weak in the Presence of Beauty" for her second studio album Raindancing. It went to number 6 in the United Kingdom, number 4 in Norway and Ireland, number 7 in New Zealand, number 30 in Australia and number 25 in the Netherlands. ===Track listings=== ; 7" single # "Weak in the Presence of Beauty" - 3:37 # "To Work on You" - 4:13 ; 12" single #1 # "Weak in the Presence of Beauty" (Extended Remix) – 6:04 # "Weak in the Presence of Beauty" (Single Version) - 3:37 # "To Work on You" - 4:13 ; 12" single #2 # "Weak in the Presence of Beauty" (Extended Remix) – 6:04 # "To Work on You" - 4:13 # "Take My Imagination To Bed" - 3:41 ==References== Category:1986 songs Category:Floy Joy (band) songs Category:Alison Moyet songs
title: Weak in the Presence of Beauty (song)
